<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8159|שָׁעָה]]</big>**</small>

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעַע‎</span>] **verb** ==be smeared over, blinded== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁעַע‎</span> ***smear*** (akin to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּעַ‎</span> id.), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> to ***smooth***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעִיעַ‎</span> ***smooth*** (of words), ***flattering***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***smooth*** (compare also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***smear over, close up***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** + **Hithpalpel** ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁתַּעַשְׁעוּ וָשֹׁ֑עוּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] ***blind yourselves and be blind !*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמְהוּ וּתְמָהוּ‎</span>); &gt; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁתָּעוּ וּשְׁעוּ‎</span>, √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁעה‎</span> ***look about*** ([[2Sam.22.42|2Sam 22:42]]); [[Isa.32.3|Isa 32:3]] read probably 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשֹׁעֶינָה‎</span>, of eyes, ***be blinded*** (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁעה‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֵינָיו הָשַׁ֑ע‎</span> [[Isa.6.10|Isa 6:10]] ***and its eyes besmear !*** — So perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָשַׁע‎</span> [[Ps.39.14|Ps 39:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֶיךָ‎</span> omitted) was intended by Masoretes (but wrongly, see [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] and others); see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעָה‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעַע‎</span>] **verb Pilpel**, etc., ==sport, take delight in, delight== (usually made = I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> ***smooth over, please***; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] compare Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ithpe\`el ***sport, trifle***, Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (loan-word ?) Vollers<sup>ZMG xiv (1891), 86, 1. 3</sup>); — 

**Pilpel** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׁעֲשַׁע‎</span> [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] the suckling ***shall sport*** on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) the cobra's hole; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁעֲשָׁ֑עְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.70|Ps 119:70]] ***I take delight in*** thy law (accusative; but ? read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֑י‎</span>, v[[Ps.119.77|Ps 119:77]]); ***Imperfect*** transitive 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁעַשְׁעוּ‎</span> [[Ps.94.19|Ps 94:19]] thy consolations ***delight*** my soul (accusative). **Palpel** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשָֽׁעֳשָׁ֑עוּ‎</span>[[Isa.66.12|Isa 66:12]] upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) the knees ***shall ye be fondled.*** **Hithpalpel** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁתַּעֲשָׁ֑ע‎</span> [[Ps.119.16|Ps 119:16]] in (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) thy statutes ***will I delight myself***, compare v[[Ps.119.47|Ps 119:47]].
